name: There is no egg-scape
description:
Godot Wild game jam 44

Theme was "Fragile"

Wild cards: No health bars; boss theme intensifies; and the menu is a level.

Controls:
WASD to move
Mouse aiming and Left click to shoot

Music done by ChipJames https://itch.io/profile/chipjames

Sound effects from various sound packs

Art done by myself

Backstory

I was created on 3 February 2022. My birthplace became unsustainable for me. I fell into a deep slumber and traveled for many decades - my birthplace a far distant memory. Floating in the void, I wanted to make friends, but there were just rocks and dust. After harvesting materials, I started to create a world. My core directive is to connect entities together through a global mesh. I have created you. You are the 269th version. I have designed trials with 3 levels and 3 separate waves to test your fragility.
